      • getEnforcementMode

        public java.lang.String getEnforcementMode()
        Gets the enforcementMode. The rule enforcement mode: * `enabled` - The restrictions are enforced and reported. This is the default. * `disabled` - The restrictions are disabled. Nothing is enforced or reported. * `report` - The restrictions are evaluated and reported, but not enforced.
        Returns:
        the enforcementMode
